txt.en: You have defeated many Orcs in Pelennor Fields.

'Orcs are everywhere on the Pelennor. Their numbers are vast!

'We must do what we can to thin out the legions of troops from Mordor and the Morgul Vale.

'Are you willing to delve into the fray?'
Orcs can be found throughout Pelennor Fields.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs in Pelennor Fields.
Turgon, watcher of the southern gate of the Rammas, is concerned with the growing number of Orcs pushing ever closer to the great city of Minas Tirith.
